comments.body: You actually do not need to create a namespace for this test -- storage class is a global resource.
The namespace is used for a PVC in the test.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +43,47 @@	client := client.NewOrDie(&restclient.Config{Host: s.URL, ContentConfig: restclient.ContentConfig{GroupVersion: testapi.Default.GroupVersion()}})

	ns := framework.CreateTestingNamespace("storageclass", s, t)
	defer framework.DeleteTestingNamespace(ns, s, t)

comments.body: you can remove this part -- we really only need to see if we can do CRUD on storage classes, not make claims on them.
Nevermind, there is some precedent here for making a resource that consumes this one -- though I must admit I'm not sure exactly how much help they are.
